entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 5.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Advanced Settings by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1449
  • Site Health: Fix issue 1545 and add some additional informations by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1547
  • Reply Block: Embed referenced post when possible by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1100
  • Onboarding: Improve troubleshooting UI by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1546
  • Add: New Health checks by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1524
  • Add: Shared Inbox setting by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1553
  • Actors: Don't convert non-numeric strings to Blog user id by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1554
  • Add: Vary header settings by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1552
  • Reply: Make Mastodon embeds work by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1555
  • Follow Me: add a button-only mode by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1133
  • Move: support same-server domain migrations by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1530
  • Import: Load on admin_init by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1561
  • Outbox: Properly handle username requests by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1559
  • Fix: Missing Actor in Outbox-Activities by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1564
  • Upgrades: Delete orphaned extra fields by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1566
  • Transformers: Allow setting properties to false. by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1567
  • Signature: Add compat for more key encodings by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1557
  • Fix: Show error if site uses "Almost Pretty Permalink" structure by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1570

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/5.6.1...5.7.0

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 5.8.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • EMA: Fix PHP Warning by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1583
  • Update tested-up-to version by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1584
  • Mention Email: Add notification option by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1577
  • Update New Follower Template by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1581
  • DM notification: Convert to HTML email by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1582
  • Importer: Add support for video and audio files by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1585
  • Fix a Undefined array key "headers" issue by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1594
  • Embed: Add Fediverse fallback to oembed attempts by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1576
  • Inbox: Apply disallowed list before processing by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1590
  • Remote Reply: Set script translations by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1595
  • Import: Convert to blocks and add reply by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1591
  • Directly link to a help tab. by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1598
  • Make notification settings user-specific by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1586
  • Add support for Multisite Language Switcher by @MatzeKitt in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1604
  • Fix: Add user context to global inbox by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1603

New Contributors

  • @MatzeKitt made their first contribution in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1604

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/5.7.0...5.8.0

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 5.9.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add "Dismiss Welcome Page Welcome" section by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1600
  • Media: Default to 4 attached images by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1607
  • Preview: Add support for video & audio by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1596
  • Fix: Set default values for an Actor-Object by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1612
  • Scheduler: Process batches for individual hooks by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1521
  • Use real Attchment types instead of Document by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1486
  • Implement FEP-c180: Problem Details for ActivityPub by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1563
  • Fix: Properly save the "Receive reblogs (boosts)" setting by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1622
  • Add the RSS Feed of the Blog as a Dashboard Widget by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1623
  • Outbox: Update hook names to follow convention by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1628
  • Editor: Add control for max image attachments by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1619
  • Fix: Set the correct Activity Actor for Outbox Items by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1626
  • Outbox: Skip posts that can't be prepared by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1627
  • Docs: Add more of them by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1599
  • Send the Vary header by default by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1638
  • Editor: Show media in Preview for drafts by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1636
  • Enable/disable content negotiation by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1639
  • Embed: Check it's an activity object before using it by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1642
  • Only show "Reply to the post" when using block-editor by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1643
  • Embed: Add support for video, audio, galleries by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1645
  • Change default settings based on caching behaviour by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1640
  • Extra Fields: Don't send more than 20 by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1660
  • Fix: Clear Errors when a Follower update is successfull by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1668
  • NodeInfo: Make sure usage data has correct format by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1667
  • Add Dashboard widgets for ActivityPub profiles by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1658
  • Properly check if blog user is enabled before showing AP profile by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1661
  • Implements Heading Customization for the Reactions Block by @vk17-starlord in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1657
  • Emails: Make sure actor URL is set correctly by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1677
  • Add Cache Config to enable ActivityPub support for Surge by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1648
  • Mention: Do not send Mention-Email for replies by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1681
  • Improve Mobile-View by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1684
  • Help-Tab: Add ActivityPub capability help to users page by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1682
  • Fix: Invalidate retries with the invalidation of an Outbox Item by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1519
  • Improve Welcome page with the focus on better onboarding. by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1625
  • Fix broken avatars by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1695
  • Send correct status header for Outbox items by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1685

New Contributors

  • @vk17-starlord made their first contribution in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1657

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/5.8.0...5.9.0
